Podcasts

Podcasts exist, and if you somehow haven't heard, now you have!
📅 Jan 20th 2022 Transmission #22 Connection: Mars Satellite

Podcasts are getting quite good recently, so I’ve decided to recommend some podcasts and software I use for accessing them.

  • The Minimalists
    • Suit and tie corporate guys talk about a meaningful life with less.
  • Safety Third
    • Internet science celebrities talk about what they do.
  • The Tim Ferris Show
    • Tim Ferris explores new and bizarre topics every episode.
  • The WAN Show
    • Tech news + Linus Media Group behind the scenes.

All of these podcasts I have on auto-download using: Antenna Pod on Android. You don’t have to try them all, but I highly recommend checking out at least one that you find interesting.

💬 Looking for comments?

I don't have comments on this site as they're difficult to manage and take up too much time. I'd rather concentrate on programming cool and new things than managing comments.

Since you can't leave a comment, feel free to ✉️ contact me instead.
